message: Let's be fair, Bob.  I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  It benefits us both to take this deal now.
Alice, I understand you want a larger share, but that's not agreeable to me. Let's be pragmatic - I propose 60/40 in my favor.  This is a good deal before inflation eats away at our potential gains.
Bob, let's be reasonable. Your offer was heavily skewed in your favor. I'm proposing a 55/45 split. This is my final offer, take it or leave it.
